official_title: To provide for duty-free imports of certain polyester filament yarns produced in CBI beneficiary countries wholly from United States materials, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule to prohibit quantitative import restrictions on certain polyester filament yarns that are produced in Caribbean Basin Initiative beneficiary countries from materials wholly produced in the United States. Grants duty-free treatment of such products.

titles.title: To provide for duty-free imports of certain polyester filament yarns produced in CBI beneficiary countries wholly from United States materials, and for other purposes.
